00033 #define MATH_PI 3.15149
00034 
00038 template<class T>
00039 class Particle_Src: public Phys_Object
00040 {
00041         public:
00042                 double Random_Gaussian_JM(double m,double s);
00043                 //nbr_total_part < 0 : infinite
00044                 //m : mean, s : sigma
00045                 //add new Particles to objs
00046                 Particle_Src(int _part_type,float _x,float _y,std::list <Phys_Object*> &_objs,int size_x,int size_y,
00047                                         int nbr_total_part,unsigned int nbr_part_now,
00048                                         float _speed_m=0,float _speed_s=0,float _angle_m=0,float _angle_s=0,float _density_m=0,float _density_s=0);
00049                 //virtual ~Particle_Src();
00050                 const bool get_is_finished(){return is_finished;}
00051                 bool update();
00052                 void set_lock(Anim_Sprite *_lock,float _lock_x,float _lock_y);
00053         private:
00054                 Anim_Sprite *lock;//locked on a sprite ?
00055                 float lock_x;//lock shift
00056                 float lock_y;
00057         
00058                 int part_type;//
00059                 int particules_remaining;//0 => destroy
00060                 //params for particles : gaussian law
00061                 float speed_m;
00062                 float speed_s;
00063                 float angle_m;
00064                 float angle_s;
00065                 float density_m;//nbr of particles every frame
00066                 float density_s;
00067                 float nbr_part_to_throw;
00068                 bool is_finished;
00069                 std::list <Phys_Object*> &objs;//where to create particles
00070 };
00071 
00072 template<class T>
00073 double Particle_Src<T>::Random_Gaussian_JM(double m,double s)
00074 {
00075         if (fabs(s)<0.0001) return m;
00076         unsigned  n1,n2;
00077         double    x1,x2,y;
00078         // on ne veut pas que <x1> et <x2> soit nuls
00079         while((n1 = rand(),0 == n1));
00080         while((n2 = rand(),0 == n2));
00081         x1 = n1/((double)(unsigned)(-2));
00082         x2 = n2/((double)(unsigned)(-2));
00083         // methode de Boc-Muller
00084         // <y> suit une loi normale reduite (m=0,s=1)
00085         y = sqrt(-2*log(x1))*cos(2.*MATH_PI*x2);
00086         return m + s*y;
00087 }
00088 
00089 template<class T>
00090 Particle_Src<T>::Particle_Src(int _part_type,float _x,float _y,std::list <Phys_Object *> &_objs,int size_x,int size_y,int nbr_total_part,unsigned int nbr_part_now,float _speed_m,float _speed_s,float _angle_m,float _angle_s,float _density_m,float _density_s)
00091         : Phys_Object(size_x,size_y),lock(NULL),lock_x(0),lock_y(0),part_type(_part_type),speed_m(_speed_m),speed_s(_speed_s),
00092         angle_m(_angle_m),angle_s(_angle_s),density_m(_density_m),density_s(_density_s),objs(_objs),nbr_part_to_throw(0.0),
00093         is_finished(false)
00094 {
00095         //std::cout<<"create part_src !!\n";
00096         x=_x;y=_y;
00097         mass=0;
00098         //std::cout<<"Create a Particle_Src\n";
00099         for (unsigned int i=0;i<nbr_part_now;i++)
00100         {
00101                 Particle * obj=new Particle(part_type);
00102                 obj->x=x;
00103                 obj->y=y;
00104                 float speed=Random_Gaussian_JM(speed_m,speed_s);
00105                 float alpha=Random_Gaussian_JM(angle_m,angle_s);
00106                 obj->speed_x=speed*cos(alpha);
00107                 if (obj->speed_x<0) obj->set_flipX(true);
00108                 obj->speed_y=speed*sin(alpha);
00109                 objs.push_back(obj);
00110         }
00111         /*std::vector <unsigned int> anim_rythm;
00112     Animation *anim1=new Animation();
00113     anim1->load_animation("data/divers/1.png",32,32,anim_rythm);
00114     anims.push_back(anim1);*/
00115 }

00117 template<class T>
00118 void Particle_Src<T>::set_lock(Anim_Sprite *_lock,float _lock_x,float _lock_y)
00119 {
00120         lock=_lock;
00121         lock_x=_lock_x;
00122         lock_y=_lock_y;
00123 }
00124 
00125 template<class T>
00126 bool Particle_Src<T>::update()
00127 {
00128         float angle_m_tmp=angle_m;
00129         
00130         //add lock speed to particules speeds ??
00131         //not now
00132         if (lock!=NULL)
00133         {
00134                 y=lock->y+lock_y;
00135                 if (lock->isXflipped())
00136                 {
00137                         x=lock->x-lock_x;
00138                         angle_m_tmp+=MATH_PI;
00139                 }else{
00140                         x=lock->x+lock_x;
00141                 }
00142         }
00143         
00144         float to_add=Random_Gaussian_JM(density_m,density_s);
00145         if (to_add<0) to_add=0.0;
00146         nbr_part_to_throw+=to_add;
00147         while(nbr_part_to_throw>1)
00148         {
00149                 Particle * obj=new Particle(part_type);
00150                 obj->x=x;
00151                 obj->y=y;
00152                 float speed=Random_Gaussian_JM(speed_m,speed_s);
00153                 float alpha=Random_Gaussian_JM(angle_m_tmp,angle_s);
00154                 obj->speed_x=speed*cos(alpha);
00155                 if (obj->speed_x<0) obj->set_flipX(true);
00156                 obj->speed_y=speed*sin(alpha);
00157                 objs.push_back(obj);
00158                 nbr_part_to_throw--;
00159         }
00160         //std::cout<<"update part !!\n";
00161         return false;
00162 }
